Discription: Given that channel admin loggin into application and verify that initated O2C transfer is waiting for approval
Veify that channel admin can't initiate approval without giving MSISDN or other channel user  details
Verify that, when you entered the MSIDN which is not initiated for O2C, it'll give error
Verify that you cant enter the user MSISDN which is not valid for O2C approval
Verify the functionality of reset button on select domain page(for search channel user)
Verify the functionality of back button on O2C trasnfer details page, which'll take back to u on search domain page
Verify the fuctionality of back button on transfer approve level one page
Verify that channel admin can reject the intiated O2C tranfer
Verify that external tx no. is required while approving O2C transfer in the system
Verify that transaction date is required while going to approve O2C transfer in the system
Verify that, zero amount cant be approved
Assertion: Approval quantity for product eTopUP, should be greater than zero.

Discription: Verify that you entered the amount which is not valid, then it will display an error msg
Assertion: Approval quantity for product eTopUP, should be numeric.

Discription: Verify that, you cant approve quantity more than requested quantity in the system
Assertion: Approval 1 quantity should not be greater than requested quantity

Discription: Verify that you can not be approve negative quantity in the system
Assertion: Approval quantity for product eTopUP, should be greater than zero.

Discription: Verify that external code cant be non numeric
Assertion: External TXN number should be positive and non fractional numeric value.

Discription: Verify that external transasction number cant have special character
Assertion: External TXN number should be positive and non fractional numeric value.

Discription: Verify that you cant enter the invalid date in external transaction field
Assertion: External TXN date is not valid

Discription: Verify that after submitting all the the correct details, it'll go to confirm page
Verify the functionality of back button on trnasfer level one approval confirm page
Verify the functionality of cancel button on, O2C approval level one confirm page
Verify that channel admin can approve the requested qunatity of O2C transfer
